label: Techniques in Translation II
description: Continuation of FR 419. Practical exercises in translating from French to English and vice versa in a variety of texts, along with an introduction to theoretical aspects of translation. 3 undergraduate hours. 2 graduate hours. Prerequisite: FR 419 or consent of instructor.
courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. 2 graduate hours. Prerequisite: FR 419 or consent of instructor.
